export default{login:function login(_ref){var username=_ref.username;localStorage.setItem('username',username);return Promise.resolve();},logout:function logout(){localStorage.removeItem('username');return Promise.resolve();},checkError:function checkError(_ref2){var status=_ref2.status;if(status===401||status===403){localStorage.removeItem('username');return Promise.reject();}return Promise.resolve();},checkAuth:function checkAuth(){return localStorage.getItem('username')?Promise.resolve():Promise.reject();},// called when the user navigates to a new location, to check for permissions /roles
